item.title: How do i make my own status..,
item.dc:creator: @klownsrus klownsrus
item.description:
@klownsrus wrote:

you can always use this code right here:

<?php

$ip = “Server ip”;
$port = “Port”;
if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5))
echo '

World 1 is:


';
else{
echo '
World 1 is:


';
fclose($sock);
}

?>


you can add this right to the website u want
online images

image codes for first 1 is http://www.blacknscape.frih.org/status/online.bmp
image codes for second 1 is http://www.blacknscape.frih.org/status/online3.bmp

Offline images

image codes for first 1 is http://www.blacknscape.frih.org/status/offline.bmp
image codes for second 1 is http://www.blacknscape.frih.org/status/offline3.bmp

All you have to do is save the offline online images you want then save and put url to them and then yea it will look like this

<?php $ip = "Server ip"; $port = "Port"; if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5)) echo '
Server is:


'; else{ echo '
Server is:


'; fclose($sock); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 01:00:09 pm[/size][hr]o and 1 more thing you can look at my world status page [url=http://www.blacknscape.frih.org/world.php]http://www.blacknscape.frih.org/world.php[/url] [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Don't bump old topics[/center]
